title: Unable to recover my password, because the email won't come.
body: Submitted the username so many times to get an email, yet no email to reset my password. I am lucky enough to contact riot support, and they want my accounts entire creation history? Like... it's literally just an email sent to the VERIFIED email of this account and they say that's not good for security? I'm so confused. I can't play because of a technical bug :(

replies.body:
If you keep trying to do a password reset and you never get an email to the one you used to verify the account, there's a good chance that someone else was able to access your account and change the email that's registered. 

So that we can get you back in the game, reach out to our us through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Also, be sure to stay _logged out_ when you submit that recovery ticket so that we can fully verify you.
i am 10000000% sure that the email is still verified to my email. I can confirm it too, like I see it in the settings. It's verified to mine.
